mapper.select: SELECT CHART_NUM, IS_NOW, C.MEM_NUM, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_TEL, MEM_GEN, RES_TIME FROM HOS_CHART C, HOS_RES R, HOS_MEMBER M WHERE IS_NOW = 'N' AND C.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM AND C.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM;

SELECT CHART_NUM, IS_NOW, C.MEM_NUM, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_TEL, MEM_GEN, RES_TIME, RES_NUM, P.PART_NUM, PART_NAME, STAFF_NAME, S.STAFF_NUM FROM HOS_CHART C, HOS_RES R, HOS_MEMBER M, HOS_STAFF S, HOS_PART P WHERE IS_NOW = 'Y' AND C.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM AND C.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM AND P.PART_NUM = S.PART_NUM AND P.PART_NUM = R.PART_NUM AND S.STAFF_NUM = R.STAFF_NUM;
mapper.update: UPDATE HOS_CHART SET IS_NOW = 'Y' WHERE CHART_NUM = #{chartNum};
UPDATE HOS_CHART SET IS_NOW = 'NN' WHERE CHART_NUM = #{chartNum};
mapper.select: SELECT HIS_NUM, C.CHART_NUM, RES_TIME, ILL_NAME, ILL_DETAIL, R.MEM_NUM, P.PART_NUM, PART_NAME, STAFF_NAME, S.STAFF_NUM, MEM_NAME FROM HOS_HISTORY H, HOS_CHART C, HOS_RES R, HOS_STAFF S, HOS_PART P, hos_member M WHERE R.RES_NUM = H.RES_NUM AND C.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM AND S.STAFF_NUM = R.STAFF_NUM AND P.PART_NUM = R.PART_NUM AND M.MEM_NUM = R.MEM_NUM AND R.MEM_NUM = #{memNum} ORDER BY HIS_NUM DESC;
SELECT CHART_NUM, M.MEM_NUM, MEM_NAME, MEM_BIRTH FROM HOS_CHART C, HOS_MEMBER M WHERE C.MEM_NUM = M.MEM_NUM AND M.MEM_NUM = #{memNum};
mapper.update: UPDATE HOS_HISTORY SET ILL_NAME = #{illName}, ILL_DETAIL = #{illDetail}, PART_NUM = #{partNum}, STAFF_NUM = #{staffNum} WHERE CHART_NUM = #{chartNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOS_HISTORY(MEM_NUM, ILL_NAME, ILL_DETAIL, STAFF_NUM, RES_NUM, PART_NUM, CHART_NUM) VALUES(#{memNum}, #{illName}, #{illDetail}, #{staffNum}, #{resNum}, #{partNum}, #{chartNum});
